dcterms:creator: M. Gupta
B. H. Schlomann
J. E. Goldford
K. Amarnath
M. S. Datta
H. L. Smith
G. Okpokwasili
dcterms:description: The gut microbiome dataset is used to study the dynamics of microbial communities in relation to nutrient availability and ecological interactions.
dcterms:title: Gut microbiome

dcterms:creator: B. H. Schlomann
R. Parthasarathy
dcterms:description: The ocean microbiome dataset provides insights into the timescales of microbial community dynamics in oceanic environments.
dcterms:title: Ocean microbiome

dcterms:creator: J. E. Goldford
M. S. Datta
H. L. Smith
dcterms:description: The serial dilution cycles dataset is used to explore microbial community assembly and dynamics under controlled laboratory conditions.
dcterms:title: Serial dilution cycles

dcterms:creator: K. Amarnath
M. S. Datta
dcterms:description: The marine bacteria co-culture dataset investigates the metabolic exchanges and stress responses between different bacterial species.
dcterms:title: Marine bacteria co-culture

dcterms:creator: M. S. Datta
dcterms:description: The marine particles dataset examines microbial interactions and successions on model marine particles.
dcterms:title: Marine particles

dcterms:creator: H. L. Smith
dcterms:description: The bacterial competition in serial transfer culture dataset explores the dynamics of competition among bacterial species in a controlled environment.
dcterms:title: Bacterial competition in serial transfer culture

dcterms:creator: G. Okpokwasili
C. Nweke
dcterms:description: The microbial growth and substrate utilization kinetics dataset provides insights into the growth rates and substrate utilization of various microbial species.
dcterms:title: Microbial growth and substrate utilization kinetics
